General.Name: Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangnan Mould & Plastic Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells automotive decorative parts. The company offers anti-rubbing strips, bumpers, sill side skirts, wheel eyebrow wheel covers, door anti-scratch decorative strips, tailgate spoilers, and electroplating parts for mid-to-high-end passenger vehicles. It also engages in the real estate development and sales; and provides hospital management and health consulting services, as well as produces and sells castings. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, China.
